document_data.name: Tacherani
document_data.mainbody:
'''Tacherani''' was an [[erinyes]] in service to the [[pit fiend]] [[Kurgaloth]].
{{Quote|''The contract is eternal!''|Tacherani}}
document_data.History:
In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Tacherani was one of many [[devil]]s brought to the [[Lightfinger Estate]] in [[Waterdeep]] to enforce a lapsed [[infernal contract]] between Kurgaloth and the [[Lightfinger (family)|Lightfinger family]].

When [[adventurer]]s arrived at the Lightfinger Estate to investigate the chaos that the devils' arrival had caused, Tacherani battled them inside the opulent mansion at the Estate's center. Although she lost the battle, the adventurers failed to slay her before she could escape.
